validation.invalid-application-name: The name must only includes lowercase letters.
validation.invalid-application-name-length: The name's length should be between 4 and 20 characters.

alert.reference-deletion-msg: You're about to delete the reference : {label}. Are you sure ?
alert.reference-csv-upload-error: An error occured while uploading the csv file

errors.missingReferenceForChecker: For data type {dataType}, datum {datum}, component {component}, you need to one of those references : {references}
errors.missingReferenceForCheckerInReference: For reference {reference} and validation {validationKey}, you need to one of those references : {references}
errors.unknownReferenceForChecker: For data type {dataType}, datum {datum}, component {component}, the reference {refType} is not in the accepted references which are: {references}
errors.unknownReferenceForCheckerInReference: For reference {reference} and validation {validationKey}, the reference {refType} is not in the accepted references which are: {references}
errors.unsupportedVersion: YAML files with version {actualVersion} aren't currently managed, expected version : {expectedVersion}
errors.undeclaredDataGroupForVariable: Variable {variable} doesn't belong to any data group, it needs to be in one
errors.variableInMultipleDataGroup: Variable {variable} is declared in several data groups, it needs to be only in one
errors.unknownVariablesInDataGroup:
Data group {dataGroup} has undeclared data : {unknownVariables}.
Known data : {variables}
errors.missingTimeScopeVariableComponentKey: Mandatory indication of the variable (and its component) used for the time period for which we need to attach the data for rights management of data type : {dataType}
errors.timeScopeVariableComponentKeyMissingVari:
Mandatory indication of the variable in which we collect the time period for which we need to attach the data for rights management of data type : {dataType}.
Accepted values : {variables}
errors.timeScopeVariableComponentKeyUnknownVari: {variable} doesn't be along to any of known variables : {knownVariables}
errors.timeVariableComponentKeyMissingComponent:
Mandatory indication of the component of : {variable} in which we collect the time period for which we need to attach the data for rights management of data type : {dataType}.
Accepted values : {knownComponents}
errors.timeVariableComponentKeyUnknownComponent:
{component} doesn't belong to any of known variables : {variable}.
Known components : {knownComponents}
errors.timeScopeVariableComponentWrongChecker: The component {component} of variable {variable} can't be used for carrying time information because it's not declared as : {expectedChecker}
errors.timeScopeVariableComponentPatternUnknown:
The component {component} of variable {variable} can't be used for carrying time information because the date format : {pattern} isn't managed.
Accepted formats : {knownPatterns}
errors.unrecognizedProperty:
Error in line {lineNumber} (column : {columnNumber}) : {unknownPropertyName}, is not a known property.
Known properties : {knownProperties}
errors.invalidFormat:
Error in line : {lineNumber} (column : {columnNumber}) : {value} doesn't have the right format.
Expected format : {targetTypeName}
errors.missingRequiredExpression: For the validation rule {lineValidationRuleKey}, you have to write the expression to evaluate in order to verify that the data are following the rules.
errors.illegalGroovyExpression: For the validation rule : {lineValidationRuleKey}, the expression : {expression} is not correct. Expression compilation error at line : {compilationError.lineNumber} (column : {compilationError.columnNumber}) message '{compilationError.message}'
errors.unknownCheckerName: For the validation rule : {lineValidationRuleKey}, '{checkerName}' is declared but is not a known checker
errors.unknownCheckerNameForVariableComponentCh: In the reference validation {reference} and the validation rule {validationRuleDescriptionEntryKey} , ' {name} ' is declared but not a known check: possible values ​​ {variableComponentCheckers} .
errors.csvBoundToUnknownVariable: In the CSV format, header {header} is bound to unknown variable {variable}. Known variables: {variables}
errors.unknownCheckerNameForVariableComponent:
In the description of the data type {datatype} the component {component} of the variable {variable} the value checker {checkerName} is declared but it is not a known control
Known checkers are {variableComponentCheckers}
errors.missingColumnReferenceForCheckerInRefere: In the reference description {reference} and the validation {validationRuleDescriptionEntryKey} the value checker {checkerName} declares unknown columns {missingColumns } : possible values ​​ {knownColumns}
errors.missingParamColumnReferenceForCheckerInR: In the description of the {reference} , the validation rule {validationRuleDescriptionEntryKey} does not specify on which columns the rule should be executed by declaring a columns parameter
errors.csvBoundToUnknownVariableComponent: In the CSV format, header {header} is bound to {variable} but it has no {component} component. Known components: {components}
errors.invalidKeyColumns: In the description of reference {reference}, colomns {unknownUsedAsKeyElementColumns} are declared as components of the key but there are no such columns. Known columns are {knownColumns}
errors.headerColumnPatternNotMatching:
Column header pattern not matching. Pattern to match : {expectedHeaderColumnPattern}
Actual header : {actualHeaderColumn}
errors.unexpectedTokenCount:
Unexpected token count. Expected : {expectedTokenCount}
Actual header : {actualHeader} has {actualTokenCount} tokens
errors.invalidHeaders:
Invalid headers. Expected columns : {expectedColumns}
Actual columns : {actualColumns}
Missing columns : {missingColumns}
Unknown columns : {unknownColumns}
errors.patternNotMatched: For the component : {variableComponentKey} the value {value} doesn't match expected pattern : {pattern}.
errors.invalidDate: For the component : {variableComponentKey} the date {value} doesn't match expected pattern : {pattern}.
errors.invalidInteger: For the component : {variableComponentKey} the value {value} must be an integer.
errors.invalidFloat: For the component : {variableComponentKey} the value {value} must be a float.
errors.checkerExpressionReturnedFalse: The following checker expression isn't fulfilled : {expression}
errors.requiredValue: For the component : {variableComponentKey} the value can't be null.
